Articles.Content:
hi all,

im from austria and enjoy flying games (simulations).

i have a glider license so i know the basics of flying. rockets are a different thing though and im quite hooked.

learned a lot new theory stuff just by playing this game. great!

bought the game a while ago (0.18?) on steam and its very addicting.

288 hours so far! my most played game on steam is shogun2 with 621h.

guess ksp will beat it...

had to do a little research at the beginning but there are a lot of helpful tutorials/vids.

thanks, community looks very nice.

im still playing with no mods at all. maybe i will add a few parts when i get bored.

here are some screenshots i made:

http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197963630444/screenshots/

alt+tab to KSP:sticktongue:
Welcome to the forums! If you need any help, just ask. Shogun 2 is good, yes , but nothing (except perhaps R2TW) beat KSP
Nice screenshots! It's great to see another "non-mod" player who has managed to get some quality exploring in!
